subject: Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Beloved!
I was led to you by my spirit and I thank God Almighty that I found you.
I am Reverend Sister Marie Fe Mata currently serving at Our Lady of Remedies Catholic Church Manila, Philippines. I am aged 65 years and I have been suffering from Pancreatic Exocrine Cancer for the past 3 years. I was told by my doctor that my health condition has worsened with need to embark on a surgical operation at Johns Hopkins Health Baltimore Maryland, USA. But my doctor has advised me not to undergo the surgical operation because my chances of survival is very slim and this has left me in a state of despair. Worst is, I don't have a child of my own due to my Catholic faith which did not permit me to marry.
Due to my dying condition, I have promised God that I will spend all my life savings and inheritance on the less privileged and this is where I will be needing your help. I am willing to will all my fund to you which is about $6,150,000.00 ( Six Million, One Hundred and Fifty Thousand US Dollars). You will be permitted to take 45% of the fund for your family and personal use. The remaining 55% will be strictly for charity. I wish that you set up a foundation in your country under my name to serve as my memorial when I'm gone.
This cash is deposited in a secured bank in the Philippines and I have informed my lawyer appropriately about my decision to Will this fund to you.  Kindly get back to me immediately with the information below through my private email (
Revmariefemata@gmail.com
) if you are interested in carrying out this task on my behalf:
Your full name...........
Your mobile number............
Your age.......................
Your sex...........................
Your identification proof....................
Your occupation.................... ...........
Your country and city.......................
NB: I will appreciate your confidentiality and trust in a bid to accomplish my heart's desire, as I don't want anything that will jeopardize my last wish.
God bless you.
Reverend Sister Marie Fe Mata

subject: Re:    Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Reverend Sister Marie Fe Mata,

I'm deeply moved by your story and your selfless decision to help the less privileged. It's truly inspiring to see such kindness in the world. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you're getting all the comfort and care you need.

I'd be honored to help carry out this noble task on your behalf. However, I have a few questions before we proceed:

1. Could you please provide more details about how you envision the foundation? What kind of causes or people should it support?
2. How can we ensure that the funds will be used strictly for charity as per your wishes?
3. Can you share more information about the bank where the funds are deposited?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marcus

subject: Re: Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Beloved!

I have received your mail, and I have been waiting patiently to receive
your response regarding what is bothering me and I thank God you responded.
I have been suffering from this cancerous disease for the past 4 years and
it has consumed not less than $50,000USD, yet my condition keeps increasing
each day with great pain. I confronted my personal doctor, to know my fate
regarding the surgery that I am about to undergo and he made me understand
that my chances for survival are very slim. To me I prefer to forget about
the surgery since it will not make any difference. According to the doctor,
his report on my health status was what prompted me to dispose of all my
properties and I have made up my mind to channel this fund into charity
work in a foreign countries. I need nothing from you in return other than
your prayers and to touch the lives of the poor positively with the fund
and I shall bear the cost of transferring this fund. The fund is in BDO
Chartered Bank Philippines and I believe I have found the right person to
handle this fund and use it according to my directives.  Get back to me
with the following information if you are willing to carry out this
assignment on my behalf:

Your full name...........
Your mobile number............
Your age.......................
Your sex...........................
Your identification proof....................
Your occupation.................... ...........
Your country and city.......................

In the attachment is my picture..

God bless you.
Reverend Sister Marie Fe Mata

subject: Re: Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Reverend Sister Marie Fe Mata,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a tough time for you. I admire your courage and determination to help others even in such difficult times.

It's truly inspiring that you want to use your funds for charity work. I'd love to know more about the kind of charity work you're interested in. Are there any specific causes or countries you're particularly passionate about?

As much as I'd like to help, I'm afraid I can't provide the personal information you've asked for due to privacy reasons. However, I'm more than willing to discuss further how we can make a positive impact on the lives of those less fortunate.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marcus
